meanings.definition: The act of making something suitable or appropriate for a particular person or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She did the suiting of the gift to match his preferences.
meanings.sent2: The suiting of the music to the occasion was perfect.
meanings.sent3: The suiting of the costume to the character made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her suiting of words to emotions was like a painter with colors.
meanings.sent5: The suiting of the puzzle pieces was crucial for the final picture.

meanings.definition: A set of clothes made from the same fabric, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers or a jacket and skirt.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful suiting to the business meeting.
meanings.sent2: The suiting she chose for the event was elegant.
meanings.sent3: His suiting for the wedding made him look sharp.
meanings.sent4: The suiting of the outfit was like a matching puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The suiting of the attire made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of being appropriate or acceptable for a particular situation or purpose.
meanings.sent1: His suiting to the role in the play was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The suiting of her actions to the rules was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The suiting of the joke to the moment made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her suiting to the challenges was like a warrior in battle.
meanings.sent5: The suiting of the solution to the problem was like finding a perfect match.
